channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Contraction Before Expansion: How AI Is Poised Spark Tech Services Growth
item.description: The industry has entered a market share swap environment. Those gaining ground are doing so by taking business from competitors. Overall, there's effe...

item.title: Porn Ban—Google’s ‘Invisible’ Tracking Is Already On Your Phone
item.description: Porn bans do not work — VPN use is surging. But Google’s hidden phone tracking cannot be disabled and it’s already in use.

item.title: Lithuania’s AI Fast Lane Approach To Shortcut EU Rules, Ship Faster
item.description: Lithuania wants AI companies to ship products that meet EU’s toughest rules without burning a hole in their runway or slowing their ability to compete...

item.title: Generative AI And LLMs Are Valuable Psychometric Instruments For Gauging Human Mental Health At Scale
item.description: The latest AI and LLMs can be used to at-scale measure societal mental health. We ought to devise new psychometrics accordingly. An AI Insider scoop.

item.title: Amazon Issues Attack Warning For 300 Million Customers

item.title: On meeting spec

item.title: Infantilization
item.description: The worst sort of powerlessness happens when we’re seduced into doing it to ourselves.

item.title: Hard work and goodwill
